title: BRIEF-Sidus Investment Confirms Nominating 2 Candidates To Acacia's Board
text: March 20, 2018 / 4:09 PM / Updated 12 minutes ago BRIEF-Sidus Investment Confirms Nominating 2 Candidates To Acacia's Board Reuters Staff March 20 (Reuters) - Sidus Investment Management: * SIDUS INVESTMENT MANAGEMENT AND BLR PARTNERS ISSUE LETTER TO STOCKHOLDERS OF ACACIA RESEARCH CORPORATION * ‍SIDUS INVESTMENT MANAGEMENT SAYS IN LETTER, CONFIRMED IT NOMINATED 2 INDEPENDENT CANDIDATES, CLIFFORD PRESS AND ALFRED TOBIA JR., TO ACACIA’S BOARD * SIDUS INVESTMENT MANAGEMENT SAYS SIDUS INVESTMENT & BLR PARTNERS LP HAS OWNERSHIP OF ABOUT 4.1 PCT OF ACACIA RESEARCH OUTSTANDING SHARES * SIDUS INVESTMENT MANAGEMENT​ SAYS “REPEATEDLY ATTEMPTED TO PRIVATELY ADDRESS OUR CONCERNS” WITH ACACIA RESEARCH Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
